stories.text:
I have launched a bootstrapped hardware startup and found product market fit. Launched small and trying to keep up.

I come from a B2B software world and so my mindset is programmed differently. Im looking for a mentor that can answer a few questions over email once a week. Probably would take you 15min. Questions will vary. From business, marketing, customer support to maybe more production related stuff.

Im looking for someone who has been there and built a successful B2C hardware business to 7-8 figures of revenue at least.

Would love to chat and feel free to let me know what a fair compensation would be.
stories.title: Ask HN: Looking for a Hardware Startup Mentor
